Metadata.Description: This application deploys a Global RDS Aurora cluster.

CodeDownloadUrl.Description: The URL from which the supporting codebase can be downloaded. This codebase is used to deploy the demo dashboard.

DatabaseAdminPassword.Description: The password to be used for the RDS Aurora admin account.

DatabaseAdminUsername.Description: The username to be used for the RDS Aurora admin account.

FailoverDatabaseSubnetZoneACidr.Description: The CIDR range you wish to use for your primary database subnet.

FailoverDatabaseSubnetZoneBCidr.Description: The CIDR range you wish to use for your failover database subnet.

FailoverPrivateSubnetZoneACidr.Description: The CIDR range you wish to use for your primary private subnet.

FailoverPrivateSubnetZoneBCidr.Description: The CIDR range you wish to use for your failover private subnet.

FailoverPublicSubnetZoneACidr.Description: The CIDR range you wish to use for your primary public subnet.

FailoverPublicSubnetZoneBCidr.Description: The CIDR range you wish to use for your failover public subnet.

FailoverRegionName.Description: The name of the failover region (e.g., us-east-1). You may choose any AWS Region that supports the required services. The primary and failover regions must be different.

FailoverVpcCidr.Description: The CIDR range you wish to use for your VPC.

PrimaryDatabaseSubnetZoneACidr.Description: The CIDR range you wish to use for your primary database subnet.

PrimaryDatabaseSubnetZoneBCidr.Description: The CIDR range you wish to use for your failover database subnet.

PrimaryPrivateSubnetZoneACidr.Description: The CIDR range you wish to use for your primary private subnet.

PrimaryPrivateSubnetZoneBCidr.Description: The CIDR range you wish to use for your failover private subnet.

PrimaryPublicSubnetZoneACidr.Description: The CIDR range you wish to use for your primary public subnet.

PrimaryPublicSubnetZoneBCidr.Description: The CIDR range you wish to use for your failover public subnet.

PrimaryRegionName.Description: The name of the primary region (e.g., us-east-1). You may choose any AWS Region that supports the required services. The primary and failover regions must be different.

PrimaryVpcCidr.Description: The CIDR range you wish to use for your VPC.

PublicFqdn.Description: The FQDN to be used by this application (e.g., multi-region-aurora.example.com). An Amazon ACM Certificate will be issued for this FQDN and attached to an Amazon ALB. This FQDN should NOT have a DNS record currently defined in the corresponding Route 53 Hosted Zone.

PublicHostedZoneId.Description: The ID of the public Route 53 Hosted Zone corresponding to the public Service FQDN.

Properties.Description: Downloads dashboard code from a remote repo and deploys it to Amazon S3
